name: sentry
description: Retrieving and analyzing issues from Sentry.io

tools.name: get_sentry_issue
tools.description:
Retrieve and analyze a Sentry issue by ID or URL. Use this tool when you need to:
                - Investigate production errors and crashes
                - Access detailed stacktraces from Sentry
                - Analyze error patterns and frequencies
                - Get information about when issues first/last occurred
                - Review error counts and status

issue_id_or_url.description: Sentry issue ID or URL to analyze

prompts.name: Retrieve issue details from Sentry
prompts.description: Use this command to get detailed information about a specific Sentry issue using its ID or URL.

YOUR_SENTRY_TOKEN.description: An authentication token required to access your Sentry account and retrieve issue details.
YOUR_SENTRY_TOKEN.title: YOUR_SENTRY_TOKEN
